S.FORM: == Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de 伊斯蘭瑪巴德 == Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de "W-e-du kamu:اسلام آباد‎, sumad han:Islām Ābād‎", u Pa-ci-se-tan a tukay, kitidaan nu Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de a tukayan. Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de itida i Pa-ci-se-tan wali amis a Puo-te'-wa-buyu'an, talakaw limsipsep kun-ce, u kalasengesengetan ku caledes nu demiadan. itini i likisi, ina kitidaan u sakatayda i Pan-pu atu Kay-puo-e-pu-se-tu a sacumud nu ziwziluan, ina Ma-ke-la sacumud u sakatayda tu tusaay a kitidaan nu cacumudan. :اسلام آباد‎,轉寫:Islām Ābād‎) . Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de nikayzuan itida i caysiwnemsep mihcaan, miliyun tun aw tukay nu Ke'-la-ce. aydaay nu Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de nu malisimetay a kanatalan, saan u Pa-ci-se-tan samalahatay a kanatal, masausiay nu Gamma+ a kanatalan nu tukay. nika namaka tucay a secian, Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de kinapina debungan nu makatalay a tademaw. itini i tusepseppic mihcaan enem a bulad tusa a demiadan a Dan-may muenengay i Pa-ci-se-tan ta-se-kun mabakuhac atu nuydaan a mihcaan tu siwa a bulad tusa a bataan a demiadan a Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de a hutiluan mabakuhac. Gamma . Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de itida i tusepcaycay mihcaan idaw ku tusa a lasubu a wang nu tademawan, atu mitepalay a tukay u La-wa-e-pin pulungen nu heni ku tademaw malakuuyt ku siplimsep a wang nu tademawan, mala sakatulu nu kanatal a tukayan nu tademawan. nu nikapatidengan tina tukayan idaw tu ku namaka cuwacuwaay a tademawan, ina Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de mala Pa-ci-se-tan itini i kitakidan atu talakaway nu tukayan a tukayan. malakitakid nu tukay, Pa-ci-se-tan sihu, Pa-ci-se-tan-cuntung hu ci "Aiwan-e-Sadr" itida a mueneng. Pa-ci-se-tan kakiningan tu paya itida tu. Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de u sayadahay nu sakayhekal nu tahudan, tapang atu mikuliay i siehu a lalitemuhan nu kitidaan. (Aiwan-e-Sadr) . Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de a tukay mibuwahay nu wi-yen-huy "CDA" misuayaw tu tukay ni patidengan tu mamikuwan a tademaw. Nan-ya satabakiay a Cin-cen-biyu, sakasepat nu satabakiay nu kitakidan a Cin-cen-se Fea-sa-e-Cin-cen-se itida ku nipatideng i Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de. Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de idaw ku tabakiay nu cacudadan sabaw enem ku palutatengaan. pasu Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de nu kaygung tabakiay a cacudadan "AU", Cen-na tabakiay a cacudadan "QAU" atu Pa-ci-se-tan kuo-li-ke-ci-tabakiay a cacudadan "NUST", duma u A-la-ma.Yi-ke'-e-kay-fan tabakiay a cacudadan "ALOU" sipakayda nu namiccudaday a tademaw u sakasepat nu kitakidan a tabakiay nu cacudadan. (CDA) (AU),真納大學(QAU) (NUST),其中阿拉瑪·伊克巴爾開放大學(AIOU) . tapang nu cudad 詞源 "Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de" ""Islamabad"" cacay nu sasulitan namaka "Islam" atu "abad", imi u Yi-se-lan a tukay. "Islam" u A-la-puo kamu masacacayay han u Yi-se-lan-cyaw nu kiwkayan, "-abad" namaka Puo-se-kamu tu niyadu' a pinganganan, imi u "sitademaway nu aenengan a kitidaan" hatu "tukay". "伊斯蘭瑪巴德"("Islamabad")一詞來自"Islam"和"abad",其意為"伊斯蘭的城市"."Islam" ,"-abad" ". Likisi 歷史 Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de tukay atu Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de aenengan i Puo-te'-wa-e pabaw nu buyu'an a nu liwan a kitidaaan saan u Ya-cuo sayaway a Tadema nu liwan a kitidaan. itida i buyu'an maadih ku nu sumamaday nu ba'tuan a liwan nu kitidaan taneng talaayaw mikilim tu lima a bataan nu wang a mihcaan, itida i Suo-an-sawacan makatepa tu liwan nu kitidaan u namaka pin-ci a naayaway nu tademaw anipisaculiculilan ni patahekalan tu sasasiwmian. Pa-ci-se-tan caysiwsippic mihcaan a patideng tina kanatalan, tukay itida i lalabu nu kanatal nu timulan a minatu nu tukay Ke'-la-ce. Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de yadah ku mahiniay sakay tukay a nipatidengan tu mahiniay. nu ayawan a cuntun nu Pa-ci-se-tan ci A-yiw-pu.Han mangalay misakapah tu nikaudip, nika dayday nu Pa-ci-se-tan sakay sakaudip itida milingling tu Ke-la-ce nu nikudanay a binacadan nu kakitidaan. kacaledesan tawya ku Ke'-la-ce, sakatimul tu micapi tu A-la-puo bayuan, sakay hitayan caay kaw matatungusa. misuayaw tu Pa-ci-se-tan kapah patideng tu niyaniyadu'an tu sakalalitemuhan a tukayan. sisa kinapina misimsim ku syahu tu sapilimadaw katukuh i caysiwlimsiw mihcaan tusa a bulad kya mapatideng i Puo-te'-wa-e buyuan patideng i wali amis a kitidaan nu La-wa-e-pin-ti. pangangan han "Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de". ". caysiwpicsep mihcaan kakitidaan nu lalaan makaala tu siwseppic pin-fan-kun-li, aydaay namin a sangan, idaw ku dayday nu Yi-se-lan. makakenih tu niyadu', kakakulian, sasasiwbayan, aenengan nu tapang, kakakulian tu ba'ketay, langlangdawan nu kilakilangan nikakenihan. kakulian nu sihu timulan u sakay nutawan nu kanatalan a kitidaan, nutipan u ahebalay nu hulican a dadan, tepal han u kapulungan a sakakawawan, ilabu idaw ku gingku, pahusuay, pahusuay tu tilibi, dansinkiwk. Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de u kasengesengedan cacaledesan nu demiadan "Cwa".i enemay nu buladan ku sacaledesay, hucunu demiadan makaala tu 38ﾟC (100.4ﾟF).kasengetan nu demiad i pituay a bulad, tabaki ku nikahetik nu udad, labii han idaw ku kelekelengan a nikaudadan, hakiya idaw ku balat atu tabaki nu udadan. sasapi'ay nu udadan i cacayay nu bulad.

== Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de 伊斯蘭瑪巴德 == Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de "W-e-do kamo:اسلام آباد‎, somad han:Islām Ābād‎", o Pa-ci-se-tan a tokay, kitidaan no Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de a tokayan. Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de itida i Pa-ci-se-tan wali amis a Poo-te'-wa-boyo'an, talakaw limsipsep kon-ce, o kalasengesengetan ko caledes no demiadan. itini i likisi, ina kitidaan o sakatayda i Pan-po ato Kay-poo-e-po-se-to a sacomod no ziwziloan, ina Ma-ke-la sacomod o sakatayda to tosaay a kitidaan no cacomodan. :اسلام آباد‎,轉寫:Islām Ābād‎) . Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de nikayzoan itida i caysiwnemsep mihcaan, miliyon ton aw tokay no Ke'-la-ce. aydaay no Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de no malisimetay a kanatalan, saan o Pa-ci-se-tan samalahatay a kanatal, masaosiay no Gamma+ a kanatalan no tokay. nika namaka tocay a secian, Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de kinapina debongan no makatalay a tademaw. itini i tosepseppic mihcaan enem a bolad tosa a demiadan a Dan-may moenengay i Pa-ci-se-tan ta-se-kon mabakohac ato noydaan a mihcaan to siwa a bolad tosa a bataan a demiadan a Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de a hotiloan mabakohac. Gamma . Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de itida i tosepcaycay mihcaan idaw ko tosa a lasobo a wang no tademawan, ato mitepalay a tokay o La-wa-e-pin polongen no heni ko tademaw malakooyt ko siplimsep a wang no tademawan, mala sakatolo no kanatal a tokayan no tademawan. no nikapatidengan tina tokayan idaw to ko namaka cowacowaay a tademawan, ina Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de mala Pa-ci-se-tan itini i kitakidan ato talakaway no tokayan a tokayan. malakitakid no tokay, Pa-ci-se-tan siho, Pa-ci-se-tan-contong ho ci "Aiwan-e-Sadr" itida a moeneng. Pa-ci-se-tan kakiningan to paya itida to. Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de o sayadahay no sakayhekal no tahodan, tapang ato mikoliay i sieho a lalitemohan no kitidaan. (Aiwan-e-Sadr) . Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de a tokay mibowahay no wi-yen-hoy "CDA" misoayaw to tokay ni patidengan to mamikowan a tademaw. Nan-ya satabakiay a Cin-cen-biyo, sakasepat no satabakiay no kitakidan a Cin-cen-se Fea-sa-e-Cin-cen-se itida ko nipatideng i Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de. Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de idaw ko tabakiay no cacodadan sabaw enem ko palotatengaan. paso Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de no kaygong tabakiay a cacodadan "AU", Cen-na tabakiay a cacodadan "QAU" ato Pa-ci-se-tan koo-li-ke-ci-tabakiay a cacodadan "NUST", doma o A-la-ma.Yi-ke'-e-kay-fan tabakiay a cacodadan "ALOU" sipakayda no namiccodaday a tademaw o sakasepat no kitakidan a tabakiay no cacodadan. (CDA) (AU),真納大學(QAU) (NUST),其中阿拉瑪·伊克巴爾開放大學(AIOU) . tapang no codad 詞源 "Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de" ""Islamabad"" cacay no sasolitan namaka "Islam" ato "abad", imi o Yi-se-lan a tokay. "Islam" o A-la-poo kamo masacacayay han o Yi-se-lan-cyaw no kiwkayan, "-abad" namaka Poo-se-kamo to niyado' a pinganganan, imi o "sitademaway no aenengan a kitidaan" hato "tokay". "伊斯蘭瑪巴德"("Islamabad")一詞來自"Islam"和"abad",其意為"伊斯蘭的城市"."Islam" ,"-abad" ". Likisi 歷史 Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de tokay ato Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de aenengan i Poo-te'-wa-e pabaw no boyo'an a no liwan a kitidaaan saan o Ya-coo sayaway a Tadema no liwan a kitidaan. itida i boyo'an maadih ko no somamaday no ba'toan a liwan no kitidaan taneng talaayaw mikilim to lima a bataan no wang a mihcaan, itida i Soo-an-sawacan makatepa to liwan no kitidaan o namaka pin-ci a naayaway no tademaw anipisacolicolilan ni patahekalan to sasasiwmian. Pa-ci-se-tan caysiwsippic mihcaan a patideng tina kanatalan, tokay itida i lalabo no kanatal no timolan a minato no tokay Ke'-la-ce. Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de yadah ko mahiniay sakay tokay a nipatidengan to mahiniay. no ayawan a conton no Pa-ci-se-tan ci A-yiw-po.Han mangalay misakapah to nikaodip, nika dayday no Pa-ci-se-tan sakay sakaodip itida milingling to Ke-la-ce no nikodanay a binacadan no kakitidaan. kacaledesan tawya ko Ke'-la-ce, sakatimol to micapi to A-la-poo bayoan, sakay hitayan caay kaw matatongosa. misoayaw to Pa-ci-se-tan kapah patideng to niyaniyado'an to sakalalitemohan a tokayan. sisa kinapina misimsim ko syaho to sapilimadaw katokoh i caysiwlimsiw mihcaan tosa a bolad kya mapatideng i Poo-te'-wa-e boyoan patideng i wali amis a kitidaan no La-wa-e-pin-ti. pangangan han "Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de". ". caysiwpicsep mihcaan kakitidaan no lalaan makaala to siwseppic pin-fan-kon-li, aydaay namin a sangan, idaw ko dayday no Yi-se-lan. makakenih to niyado', kakakolian, sasasiwbayan, aenengan no tapang, kakakolian to ba'ketay, langlangdawan no kilakilangan nikakenihan. kakolian no siho timolan o sakay notawan no kanatalan a kitidaan, notipan o ahebalay no holican a dadan, tepal han o kapolongan a sakakawawan, ilabo idaw ko gingko, pahosoay, pahosoay to tilibi, dansinkiwk. Yi-se-lan-ma-pa-de o kasengesengedan cacaledesan no demiadan "Cwa".i enemay no boladan ko sacaledesay, hocono demiadan makaala to 38ﾟC (100.4ﾟF).kasengetan no demiad i pitoay a bolad, tabaki ko nikahetik no odad, labii han idaw ko kelekelengan a nikaodadan, hakiya idaw ko balat ato tabaki no odadan. sasapi'ay no odadan i cacayay no bolad.
